br.com.concepting.framework.persistence.resource

Class PersistenceResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.concepting.framework.caching.CachedObject

        • br.com.concepting.framework.persistence.resource.PersistenceResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PersistenceResource
extends BaseResource
    Classe responsável pelo armazenamento das configurações de persistência.

    fvilarinho
